description.raw:
This pull request is initial implementation of allowing mulitple genomedatas with the same reference sequence to incorporate unique track names across archives.

Both training and identify/viterbi have been tested. Posterior has not been implemented (or tested) at the moment. Track groups should be possible across archives.

I've omitted the changes necessary to the NEWS and documentation for now until there's an agreed upon set of changes in case there are any details in terms of interface or implementation that change while the pull request is in discussion.

* Rename save_observation_params to save_gmtk_input

* Add initial test of segway handling multiple genomedata archives

* Change test to use one track per genomedata archive.
    Change set_tracknames in run.py to handle multiple genomedata archives.
    Change subset_metadata to handle multiple genomedata archives.

* Remove singular genome parameter from subset_metadata_attr

* Update Observation.save to save observations across multiple genomedata archives.
    Update genomedata archives used in mulitpledatasets testcase

* Remove extraneous genomedata and bed files in multipledatasets test case.
    Add initial implementation of identify with multiple genomedata archives.

* Clean up multidata testcase script.
* Fix identify support for single and multiple genomedata archives

  • Remove extraneous genomedata and bed files in multipledatasets test case. Add initial implementation of identify with multiple genomedata archives.

  • Fix identify support for single and multiple genomedata archives
